/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with modern buildings, their curved roofs and large windows reflecting the city's contemporary architecture. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the cityscape.
